participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive individual who enjoys sharing interests with others.
participant_1.background: I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity. I wish I could live in Iceland. I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia. I have a dog. I wake up and put on my favorite band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Passionate about hobbies and family-oriented, balancing personal interests with family expectations.
participant_2.background: My family are not very happy with me wearing dingy clothes. Paps likes to go mushroom hunting. My favorite band is Pink Floyd. My parents are not into LARP, but they support my hobby. I just graduated high school with honors.

content.text: I like to LARP and go mushroom hunting with my dad. What do you like to do?
I like to go to comic cons and skate. I also love my dog!
That's cool! What's your favorite comic book series?
I like The Walking Dead. What's yours?
I love Pink Floyd. What's your favorite song by them?
I like Comfortably Numb. What's your favorite band?
I also like The Doors. What's your favorite song by them?
I like Riders On The Storm. What's your favorite thing about LARPing?
I like the role playing and being able to be someone else for a while.
That's cool. I like the costumes and the community.
Cool! I'm glad we found something in common.
